sources.description:
Mike is a brilliant young lawyer at the top of his game, and a junkie. From prostitutes to street thugs, to attorneys and judges, Mike is in a constant battle trying to balance his two worlds. Mike and his partner uncover that a major health care supply company trades profits for peopleâ€™s lives and are quickly confronted with the most dangerous lawsuit of their careers.
2011.  Stars: Chris Evans, Mark Kassen, Vinessa Shaw

metadata.Plot: Idealistic lawyers Mike Weiss and Paul Danziger are partners. Mike is a drug-addict and Paul is a family man with a pregnant wife. When nurse Vicky Rogers seeks them out, they learn that she contracted AIDS a couple of years ago when she was accidentally pinpricked with a contaminated needle by a violent patient. Vicky shows a retractable safety needle invented by engineer Jeffrey Matthew Dancort, who owns the Safety Point Company, but is unable to sell his product to any hospital from the United Medical group, apart from San Antonio Memorial. Danziger and Weiss accept the case and go to court against United Medical, defended by powerful lawyer Nathaniel Price. Soon, they see all the doors closed in their fight against the powerful mafia of the medical supply system.
metadata.Writer: Paul Danziger, Chris Lopata, Ela Thier
metadata.Actors: Chris Evans, Mark Kassen, Vinessa Shaw
